name: Cloud Security Assessment
description: AWS, Azure, GCP Cloud Infrastructure Security Assessment

deliverables.title: Cloud Asset Discovery
deliverables.description: Discover and inventory cloud resources across accounts/subscriptions
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM hosts

deliverables.title: IAM Policy Review
deliverables.description: Review IAM policies, roles, and permissions for over-privileged access
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%IAM%' OR title LIKE '%permission%' OR title LIKE '%role%'

deliverables.title: Storage Bucket Assessment
deliverables.description: Check S3/Blob/GCS buckets for public access and misconfigurations
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%S3%' OR title LIKE '%bucket%' OR title LIKE '%storage%'

deliverables.title: Network Security Groups Review
deliverables.description: Audit security groups, NACLs, and firewall rules
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%security group%' OR title LIKE '%firewall%' OR title LIKE '%NACL%'

deliverables.title: Encryption Assessment
deliverables.description: Verify encryption at rest and in transit for cloud resources
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%encryption%' OR title LIKE '%KMS%'

deliverables.title: Secrets Management Review
deliverables.description: Check for exposed secrets, API keys, and credential management
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%secret%' OR title LIKE '%API key%' OR title LIKE '%credential%'

deliverables.title: Metadata Service Exploitation
deliverables.description: Test for IMDS/metadata service vulnerabilities (SSRF to metadata)
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%metadata%' OR title LIKE '%IMDS%' OR title LIKE '%169.254%'

deliverables.title: CloudTrail/Logging Review
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%CloudTrail%' OR title LIKE '%logging%'

deliverables.title: Container Security Assessment
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%container%' OR title LIKE '%Kubernetes%' OR title LIKE '%Docker%'

deliverables.title: Serverless Security Review
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%Lambda%' OR title LIKE '%serverless%' OR title LIKE '%function%'
